sense.def:
Stvar ali oseba, ki je
sole
, je ena sama svoje vrste.

seg.quote: In some families, the woman is the sole wage earner.
They went with the sole purpose of making a nuisance of themselves.

sense.def:
To have sole charge or ownership of something
pomeni biti edina oseba, ki je odgovorna za nekaj ali ki je lastnica nečesa.

seg.quote: She has the sole responsibility for bringing up the child.

sense.def:
The sole
je spodnja površina stopala, čevlja ali nogavice.

A sole
je ploščata riba, ki jo lahko tudi jemo. Množinska oblika je prav tako
sole
.
